track_title: La Metta, Dima, Kick, Fizz and Fozz
task_executed: Manage digital distribution, music marketing, and audience engagement

distribution_plan.distribution_service: [To be determined - e.g., DistroKid, TuneCore, CD Baby]

metadata.artwork: [To be designed - visually aligned with Aurora's design specs]

pre_release: Teaser campaign on social media (short audio clips, visualizers based on UI design)
Announce release date and pre-save link across all channels
Engage with music blogs and influencers for early reviews/features
Utilize the Dashboard UI (T8) as a visual asset in promotional materials
release_day: Update social media profiles with release links
Run targeted ads on social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, Facebook)
post_release: Share positive reviews and fan reactions
Submit to relevant playlists (editorial and user-generated)

strategy: Respond to comments and messages promptly
Run polls and Q&As related to the track's theme and creation process
Encourage fan art or interpretations inspired by the lyrics and visuals
Host live sessions to discuss the music and the looping execution concept
Monitor streaming analytics to understand listener behavior and adapt strategy
audience_engagement.feedback_loop: Gather feedback from analytics and direct engagement to inform future iterations of the loop (T14).

next_actions: Select and contract with a digital distribution service.
Set precise release date and schedule pre-save campaign.
Develop visual assets for promotion (e.g., short video clips, social media graphics).
